author: CNET
description: The Meta Ray-Ban Display can currently only handle lens prescriptions ranging from +4.00 to -4.00, but there's a scientific reason for this limitation (for now). #metarayban #metaglasses #arglasses #metaraybandisplay #meta
title: Why Making Prescription Meta Ray-Ban Display Glasses Gets Tricky

author: CNET
description:
Filmed with the Gen 2 Meta Ray-Bans 🤓 

The Display glasses are available in two colors - black and sand  - and come with a corresponding neural band that you can use to control in the lens display. Stay tuned for our review. #metarayban #displayglasses #meta #arglasses #metaraybandisplay
title: Unboxing the $800 Meta Ray-Ban Display Glasses

author: CNET
title: Amazon Unveils $100 Blink Arc Security Camera That Delivers a 180-Degree View

author: CNET
description:
Apple's wellness features extend beyond just heart rate, even with older models. CNET Video Producer Carly Marsh explores several tricks in iOS to help decouple her from her social media usage and stop the doomscrolling.

0:00 Intro
0:13 iOS18 Wellness Features
0:32 The Baseline
1:48 Challenge 1 - Downtime Controls
2:24 Challenge 2 - App Time Limits
2:40 Challenge 3 - Screen Distance
2:53 Challenge 4 - Keep Phone Away from Bed
3:11 Midweek Check-in
4:37 Lifestyle Changes
6:39 The Data
8:48 Outro
